website_summaries.verdict: This is a comprehensive 40 piece set from a trusted manufacturer, guaranteed to be washable.
pros: Uses broad line tips, ideal for larger projects
Pigment formula is water-based, with no harsh chemicals or fumes
Tip can also be used for thin lines
cons: Some reports of dried-out markers on arrival
Duplicate colors are possible, but rare

customer_reviews.title: Great markers, even for adults!
customer_reviews.text: These markers are really nice. At first I thought they would be too small for me but they are perfect. (recently got into adult coloring books) There are SO MANY colors to choose from!!!! The tips are thicker than the normal skinny Crayola markers (photo attached)
customer_reviews.author: Silly4Lilly

customer_reviews.title: I'm an adult I swear
customer_reviews.text: So many colors. Got it for my adult coloring book
customer_reviews.author: Luella Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Large Number of Markers Semi-Dried Out Upon Receipt
customer_reviews.text: We liked the large variety of colors in this 40-pack and appreciated the packaging which allowed for storage, but a vast majority of the markers were nearly dried out when we received them. As advertised, stains on clothing washed out easily, and marks on the wood table wiped away with ease. We noticed right away that the caps fit very tightly, and my strong 3-year old needed assistance fully securing each cap after use. We loved the vibrant color selection of the markers that did work. Despite not all the markers coloring like new, I would buy these again and hope for better luck the second time around. The washability is just hard to beat!
customer_reviews.author: mamp08Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed because so far about 7 of the markers seem ...
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed because so far about 7 of the markers seem dried out and don't work. Maybe they are old. I don't know, but I can't return them now because i threw away the box. grrr
customer_reviews.author: Elliot

customer_reviews.title: Do buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these August 29th 2017. It is now October 9th 2018. The markers are all still great. However, the kids have lost a lot or ruined many of them by leaving caps off or other things. So I am planning to get them each a new set for Christmas this year. Definitely a great purchase. The colors wash off everything we haven't found something it doesn't come off. We have a 2 yo who is crazy destructive and she has colored on just about everything in the house at some point. Haha we love these.
customer_reviews.author: NewEnglandMom

customer_reviews.title: Colortime!
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely small, 4" markers but have a great selection of color. We use these for adult coloring books, but if you're wanting to fill in larger spaces go with the larger markers.
customer_reviews.author: Charles W. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not what you might think they are
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product as most Crayola products are, however the package that I received had 48 regular markers, 2 each of 24 colors, as well as the 8 gel markers and 8 window markers. I thought I had purchased 64 individual colors, as it is not specified anywhere in the product description.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Reed

customer_reviews.title: Duplicated colors
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed, because there are many duplicated colors. Inside the box you get - 48 washable markers (see breakdown), 8 Classic Color Window Markers, and 8 Classic Color Gel Markers Of the 48 washable markers, you get 4 boxes of 12 markers each Box A = 12 Classic colors Box B = 12 Classic colors (same as box A) Box C = 12 Different Colors Box D = 8 Different Colors, plus 4 of the same colors in box C So you only get 32 unique colors out of 64
customer_reviews.author: Shameless

customer_reviews.title: It’s not 40 different colors
customer_reviews.text: it says ‘the big 40’ bit I didn’t receive 40 different color markers. It came in 4 different 10 packs of markers but 2 of the 10 packs were the same. So I have 20 colored markers duplicated. The markers work well, they are durable and VERY washable, I even got it off the carpet after my kid dropped it but disappointed in the variety!
customer_reviews.author: Sally Naivar

customer_reviews.title: Duplicates!
customer_reviews.text: There’s a lot of duplicates and the box is not practical.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Just Wonderful !!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 5 year old granddaughter as she loves to draw. Although she already has an extensive array of colored gel pens, colored pencils, crayons, washable markers and chalk, I have never seen her so excited about an art set. I think it is a combination of the smaller size markers (perfect for small fingers), plus the 64 different colors. She just went nuts drawing and coloring: kept bringing me new drawings “Grandma, look at this” and explaining all the detail she had put in the drawing. I bought a 2nd set so she could have one at home and one at my house.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M.

customer_reviews.title: Markers didn't even last a week
customer_reviews.text: I splurged and bought the Broad and Fine line marker sets for my children who love drawing right now. While I typically love Crayola products, these markers, both sets, didn't even last a week. It's like the markers ran out of color. Our last sets of makers (10 counts) from regular stores last us almost a year, as I tend to buy new ones for each school year. My kids are experts at "The Magic Click" to make sure the caps are on tightly, so I don't attribute uncapped markers to the problem. I'm not sure if these are made differently or have been sitting too long in the warehouse, but the ones we got are no good.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyJoy

customer_reviews.title: Quality of these marker stinks.
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of markers for the money but they ran out very fast. The small markers work better then these fat markers. Which to me this makes no since. I was disappointed. If you need markers for coloring but the small crayola markers I have been very please with them. I tried the small ones after I was disappointed with these fat markers. Can I return in trade for the small ones?
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: This product wasn’t what we expected. There were 40 markers. 10 various blues. 10 various greens, purples and pinks, one brown, one black, two gray. No red, orange or yellow!!!! 9 colors shown on the back of the box that we’re not inside. Instead we got duplicates of several.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Cain

customer_reviews.title: as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much exactly what I expected out of a pack of crayola markers. No surprises (good or bad). Pros: + Got them on sale for a really nice price + Features match up to everything they're advertised as (washable, colors don't run into each other (bleed), etc) Cons: - Markers are darker than the color swatches on the back indicate - Some colors seem identical, so what is the point? - Still bleeds through the page - There should be more light blue, since coloring the sky is a pretty common thing, and there's like 10 shades of pink why?
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: Pretty assortment...all over the shipment box!
customer_reviews.text: Many pretty colors. A great assortment. Delivered in a box. The crayon box lid was lifted and all the crayons were poured out into the bottom of the shipment box. It was a mess and a bit annoying, since some were broken. It never feels good receiving an order that arrives sloppy and thrown in without care or respect for your purchase. My daughter helped me put the crayons one by one back in their box, and she too was disappointed seeing the new crayons we ordered in such a way. Just shouldn't be like that. If you order these, put a note to ensure box is closed securely or wrapped up before placed in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Wooo lots of markers !
customer_reviews.text: We got the 64 markers for $20. I think that’s a pretty good price and I didn’t have to go to the store during covid-19 to get them. I did not check for duplicates but even if there were we don’t mind. We are used to just the regular 10 colors that come in a pack so this is plenty! We have not used the gel or window markers yet. ••very bright colors Some pastel shade that are still bold/pretty Easy to cover big areas of paper. Smooth and washable Low odor. •• I don’t have any complaints yet at this time
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B

customer_reviews.title: We love these markers
customer_reviews.text: We love these markers! I seriously didn't think all the dark marks would come out of my 2 yr olds brand new light colored shirt, but they did. It gives us peace of mind knowing that even if these markers are used somewhere they shouldn't be, we will be able to remove the ink.
customer_reviews.author: T.J.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had great experiences with these markers in the past, and previously left a 5-star review. However, this time I think I received a bad set, because my yellow and ultraviolet markers arrived with the caps not fully attached and dried out. Yellow is still usable, but barely; the ultraviolet was clearly damaged during manufacturing and was completely dried out, and the cap won’t even go on. It’s a shame, because these aren’t all that cheap and previously I’ve been such a fan, but something went wrong with this batch.
customer_reviews.author: Casey W.

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what everyone is complaining about. There are duplicates, but not excessive. Plenty of variety. I haven't used them yet, but you can't beat the price! 12 packs of broad line markers are at least $6 a pack. You get 4 12 packs (about 31 diff. colors) & 8 different color gel & 8 different color window markers. The box is thin, but will still work for storage (for now). I will update if the markers aren't good, but 5 stars for hard to find WASHABLE broad tips!
customer_reviews.author: nicole sherer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible color assortment
customer_reviews.text: These are great markers but I was surprised at the color variety. There are several markers that are almost identical in color (two nearly-identical yellows, several close-in-color pinks and darker blues) but then no lavender, no light brown, no light blue. The biggest issue is that there are no markers that you could use for skin color for non-white characters. My daughter wanted to color in Mulan and princess Tiana in her Disney coloring book and there were literally no markers she could use for their faces. It's really unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: SeattleLiz

customer_reviews.title: The colour range selection is fine for us though
customer_reviews.text: I was confused when I was buying these, as to how many new colours we would get. It's 2 identical sets of the regular markers split into 4 boxes. The colour range selection is fine for us though. It just means I can pack away the 2 duplicate boxes for when the first set inevitably dries out. 24 unique regular markers (and then a second set of 24 is the same) The "special" sets of markers are all unique colours. Comes with a good range if skin tone colours, which my kids liked.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great package at a great price. I have 14 grandkids who think my house is an art studio :) They come here expecting good materials and fun projects so I keep a solid stock of art media and paper. These markers can get pricey, but this particular package was a great value. The kids love the huge assortment of colors. I love that they are washable in MOST instances. Once in awhile, they don't wash off something like carpet. The assortment is big enough to put a third of them away for later on when we need some new colors.
customer_reviews.author: M. Pelland

customer_reviews.title: Not so great.
customer_reviews.text: I returned these after one use. A lot of the markers were dried up and didn't color well. Though I did have the right number of different colors in the box - a lot of the colors came out so similar to other colors that they may as well have been a duplicate of another color. Other reviews showed pictures of the colored received- mine were definitely not like this in variation. This is a very disappointing set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean. Giftable. Easy to hold. This is my 4 yrs old's favorite color pens. Writes and colors so well and vibrant. Only issue is it's really hard to close the cover back. You won't be able to close this without exerting slight effort. Good thing my daughter found her own way of closing it; by slamming it against her table or any hard space depending on where she's coloring. So far, none of the covers broke. Definitely durable!
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Great for cardmaking
customer_reviews.text: I use these to color rubber stamped images on greeting cards. They are small in size but easy to hold. The tapered point allows you to easily color in larger areas as well as small ones. There are a nice selection of colors, with the exception of not having a good flesh-tone one, so my characters look a bit more pink or orange. Still, the overall effect is fine. These markers work extremely well and are easy on the pocketbook.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley E

customer_reviews.title: Where is red?
customer_reviews.text: These markers are okay, not 5-stars. First of all, it's impossible to buy markers anymore that aren't washable. I was hoping for something more vivid but I can't use permanent (Sharpie) markers for my project. Aside from that, the color selection is not great. You'd think with 40 markers you would get a REAL red - but the closest you can find in this pack is a reddish orange. There are about 6 shades of blue and 6 of green, so I don't understand why they forgot the red? Anyway, I was able to use them for my project, they just don't warrant 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: mystical mermaid

customer_reviews.title: Missing Black!
customer_reviews.text: I have not tried them but I am sure they will be good just like other Crayola markers we have had. However, the colors in the box are not as described. From the picture, you see I received duplicate colors. It wouldn’t have been a big deal if black wasn’t the one that’s missing. My daughter loves to draw using black as her outline. I may return but I’m afraid to reorder and receive the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Little Hands - But disappointed... DOUBLE CHECK END OF MARKERS TO ENSURE COMPLETE SEAL
customer_reviews.text: Definitely great for little hands to hold and learn proper grasp of writing utensils. They do clean up, but stains hands, and clothing if not attended to right away. We bought these for our daughter who has Special Needs and is learning pre-writing skills, loves to color and has trouble with her grasp. The only other thing I have been disappointed with is that we've had probably 1/2 of the markers leak at the bottom and they don't seem to be sealed properly. We've tried repairing/prevented further leaks of ink by covering bottoms of each marker with a bit of super glue which has seemed to work for now.
customer_reviews.author: Corrie Feagans

customer_reviews.title: Packaging issue
customer_reviews.text: These little skinnies washable markers are really cute and are the perfect fit for my 2 year old granddaughter. I have no problem with the product or the speed of delivery, however, the box they should have been in was crunched and torn so all the markers were loose in the plastic Prime mailing package. Not a super big deal, but if they were being purchased specifically as a gift, it wouldn't have been usable as such.
customer_reviews.author: MonicaB

customer_reviews.title: Not all the colors were in the box.
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with this box! It was 4 separate boxes of 10 within the box and the blues were all repeated (instead of 4 unique boxes of 10, two were exactly the same). The black and brown set was completely missing. Since my 3 year old had already torn the box, I can't send it back. Just beware and before you start to color make sure you have a complete set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The only markers I allow in the house
customer_reviews.text: This is a large quantity of very washable markers. These are the only markers I allow in our home. They wipe off of the high chair tray and wood floors with baby wipes, or a wet napkin. They wipe off of skin as well. The ink comes out of the clothing in the wash seamlessly. My kids know to only draw on paper, but sometimes they get carried away and their imagination leads the to scribble on the floor or something. I remind them "we only draw on paper" and then they help me to wipe up the maker. The colors are bold and diverse.
customer_reviews.author: Dina W

customer_reviews.title: Great markers!
customer_reviews.text: I used these pretty heavily over the past 10 days, and I have to say that I am pretty impressed with how well they have held up. I had one project that was the equivalent of coloring 3 full pages, and the marker never ran dry. Yes, I had to slow my coloring a bit, but it did the job. I then used the same color marker pretty heavily on another project, again without fail. I will buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Robbins

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY love.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in June of 2015, looking forward to the day that we could share these with our [then 1 yr old] granddaughter. She is now 3, and today was the day. They wrote perfectly, and she was intrigued by them [as opposed to crayons and fingerpaints] and LOVED them. VERY happy with these, they wash right off [as do all the products in the Crayola "Washable" line] She LOVED the process of selecting of each color. I reinforced the lid and sides of the box with packing tape, so they would hold up to heavy use. One Very happy set of grandparents !
customer_reviews.author: Flo

customer_reviews.title: Overall good
customer_reviews.text: Got them for granddaughter doing online kindergarten at my home. She loves how many shades of pink. Colors nice and vibrant, as I expect from Crayola. Only disappointment is that they arrived with the cap off of the black marker and it is dried out. So no black. Otherwise would be a 5 star review.
customer_reviews.author: LisaB

customer_reviews.title: the quality of the markers are great. The window markers are great
customer_reviews.text: Thought this was a box of 64 different colored markers. Its not. There are 48 broad line markers + 8 gel markers + 8 window markers. Half of those broad line markers are duplicates, so you're really only getting 40 different markers. With that said though, the quality of the markers are great. The window markers are great!
customer_reviews.author: rlsr

customer_reviews.title: These are the markers you've got to get from Amazon. For small handed adults or kids these are a must have!
customer_reviews.text: The product description does not do this item justice. These markers do have both the bold and skinny tip and are perfect for coloring. While I am an "adult", I have very small hands and these markers are perfect! The colors available really do remind me of the choices you get in a 64 count crayola box of crayons. Plus the price was very affordable for a high quality name. I highly recommend these and I am very picky! I accidently dropped a teal marker on my offwhite polar fleece shirt and it washed right out! They really are washable!
customer_reviews.author: cat lover

customer_reviews.title: 64 Markers, NOT 64 Colors
customer_reviews.text: These are great markers, but be prepared to have at least 15 color repeats. That is not including the 8 lackluster window markers (work, but are hard to see esp. the white) and the 8 gel markers (which are ok). In terms of the normal markers, you only get like 31 unique colors. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Mara

customer_reviews.title: Not great for everyday, classroom use
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was quick and markers seem like a great value. However, after only a couple days use, two of the marker tips had already broken... completely snapped off. I use them in my first grade class.. then generally know how to use markers carefully. Also, lids do not click when they are put on so it's a bit difficult for younger kids to tell if the cap is completely replaced. Other than that, this set offers a nice variety of colors.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Horrible packaging
customer_reviews.text: These pens are great. Good selection of colors, easy to hold, super easy to clean (even off walls!). They get 4 stars instead of 5 because the box is crap. It's flimsy and once the original smaller packaging within is thrown out, the pens fall over all the time. The box barely stands on its own.
customer_reviews.author: C. Farris

customer_reviews.title: Not that wasy to wash.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great, not as easy to clean as you think... my niece had some colors on her hands and it took lots of soaking and scrubbing to kinda get it off. The box is very flimsy. It is better to have another container ready before you decide to take all the markers out.
customer_reviews.author: ICFC

customer_reviews.title: Not just for the kids
customer_reviews.text: Nice selection of colors. They color fine in the adult coloring books. At least they put the name of the color on the marker, very tiny though. Just barely bleeds through the paper, but I put a backing paper behind my picture anyway. They are a little short to handle but if you put the cap on top while coloring it lengthens the marker a little for a bit better leverage. Can't understand why Crayola doesn't make this in the full size version. Seems very short-sighted with the current popularity of adult coloring books. I guess they don't need the money!
customer_reviews.author: Creaky

customer_reviews.title: Nice colors. But edited...
customer_reviews.text: This set has a great selection of colors. The color names are on the markers and the line size is great for larger areas. I really like the Crayola line of water based markers. Originally I gave this 5 stars, but had to deduct 2 stars because the colors seem to run out or dry up quickly.
customer_reviews.author: luebTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised. Fades out in seconds. Need wet wipes.
customer_reviews.text: This is not ideal for the kids chalk board at home many people use. Soon after you write it starts faddimg and almost go away in few seconds. I was not able to clean it with regular duster. I had to use wet wipes to remove it. These both points are not kids friendly. At least for me hence returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Anup Shah

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't contain 64 different colors!
customer_reviews.text: This would be a better set if all of the colors were DIFFERENT! They have multiple duplicates. When you buy most Crayola sets, all of the colors are different so that is what I expected. My kids have kept them, since Santa brought them. Just disappointed that Crayola didn't thunk this through.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanna Jamison

customer_reviews.title: These are ok, thinner than I thought.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my kids who love to color. I thought these were there really thick markers they aren't however they are thicker than the really thin markers. Some of the markers seem to last more than others I'm not sure why. the quality of the color is good the selection is good I like that it came with so many different colors and the price was good. Overall I think these are better than the off-brand markers. I would recommend these to anyone looking for a bunch of colorful markers for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Fire guy

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set!  Reasonably Priced!  LOVE that it's WASHABLE!!!  :-)
customer_reviews.text: My child was begging for markers. I wanted to get a large set with lots of colors, that of course wouldn't stain his clothes (and hands). This Crayola Washable Marker Set of 40 is just what we were looking for! My child will get hours of enjoyment using these for coloring and drawing! Thank you Crayola! :-)
customer_reviews.author: amulet

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use- easy to clean up
customer_reviews.text: Crayola washable markers are a hit with our two year old. The pack of forty offers several shades of colors- fun for the little one to have so many choices. The markers are scent-free, the colors roll thickly onto the paper, and they are easy for little hands to hold. The ink easily washes off hands and the Little Tikes table.
customer_reviews.author: Rick and CarolynTop Contributor: Pokémon

customer_reviews.title: great markers
customer_reviews.text: love the ultra washable markers, we had a smaller set of these of only 10 markers that were great and also had the none ultra washable ones and those left stains on clothes, the counters (came off after a few days or with extreme scrubbing) but what was worse was how long they stained my daughters hands. the marks would be on there for a week. So we are grateful for this 40 marker set.
customer_reviews.author: ama

customer_reviews.title: Received a used box of markers
customer_reviews.text: I read all the good reviews so I brought these markers. However I was disappointed when I received them. First off all, it is not a new box; more like someone used it and returned it. Secondly, it is not 40 different colors. Half of them are duplicates. Lastly, Some of the markers were completely dried out when I received them.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Yang

customer_reviews.title: Perfect markers!
customer_reviews.text: We love the big pack. Great color selection, markets work wonderfully for toddlers and adults and wash off easily. The window markets were a huge hit as well. Great entertainment on rainy days and washes off easily. I would recommend this for anyone who likes to color.
customer_reviews.author: Misti

customer_reviews.title: Lots of different colors
customer_reviews.text: I got these Crayola Pip Squeaks for my 4 year old and they're perfect for her little hands. I have a little trouble holding them comfortably but they're perfect for little kids hands. They come with lots of different colors and shades, we love them.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Nice Colors...That is about it.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these Crayola Pip Squeaks. I have been trying, as much as they give me LOTS of nice colors I simply cannot. They rub my coloring sheets and create streaks, they also create a weird "drag". I have tried them on matte photo paper, printing paper, $1 store Coloring Books, Creative Haven Coloring Books, and a Sargent Art Color By Numbers Poster. I only give them 3 stars for the colors. Now that Crayola is verging into the "Adult Coloring" arena, it is time to bring about a line of higher quality ultra fine markers, without a ridiculous price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Diva Las VegasTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT! Every marker was a different shade. If you receive a box with multiples, it clearly isn't a correct order and Amazon should be contacted about your order. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: CThib

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little markers
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my 22 month olds little hands! We love the variety of colors and the quantity. So far they have washed out of all clothing and surfaces they have come into contact with. They are not as easy to wash off hands as the "ultra washable" markers, but they do wash off. I think the only con to this product is keeping track of them and making sure your child puts the lids back on. And still if that happens they do not dry out quickly, so if you leave the cap off for a while and then find it, your marker is saved. Would recommend to others!
customer_reviews.author: Steber

customer_reviews.title: Caps difficult to put back on
customer_reviews.text: Love all the colors. Down side- it is very difficult to put the caps back on. You have to pound them on something hard thereby making it difficult for toddlers to replace the caps properly. I love everything Crayola, but these are a miss.
customer_reviews.author: Kuma

customer_reviews.title: Nice markers, good for travel.
customer_reviews.text: These are good quality markers. Note that they are SMALL! Pip Squeaks, as in little. Each marker is only about 4 inches long with the cap on. So about 1/2 the size of the regular skinny Crayola markers. Obviously they have less ink than a standard carrel marker. But, we bought these to take on vacation, so the smaller size was perfect for travel. There are 64 markers in the box, and it says that there are 64 distinct colors. I have to say that several of them look identical on paper, even though the cap colors are different. Overall, a good marker for a good price, and I am happy with the purchase. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Lots of kids markers for cheap! Just disappointed by the box
customer_reviews.text: This box contains a lot of big markers that are washable and good for kids arts and crafts. However I was hoping the box would be like a crayon box and have individual slots for each marker. Instead we opened it to find 4 individual boxes of each color set and no grooves for organization if you wanted to store them in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Xeon

customer_reviews.title: Numerous markers dried out upon opening
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to clean....or atleast the ones that work. Numerous markers were dried out upon first use. I’ve never had similar issues with crayola and am a brand loyalist, but I would not purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Mamax3

customer_reviews.title: Great markers
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this while we were stuck at home. The variety of colors was great. The markers are easy to use. The only drawback is that the box tore easily and it is difficult to get the markers back in the box just right so that it will close.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Beth Williams

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't contain all the colors
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine in Walmart. I thought I would get the complete color range of crayola markers has to offer only to be disappointed. I later read the reviews posted mentioning some colors come in doubles. After purchasing this I went to my local walmart once again and bought the 10 color box of classic, tropical, brights and bold for less than $10 in all. Now I have a complete set.
customer_reviews.author: Mariaposa

customer_reviews.title: I really like the tiered design for holding the four individual inner ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased each of my children their own box of these markers as I knew if I didn't they would fight over them! I really like the tiered design for holding the four individual inner cartons of 16 markers each. Taking each carton out of the tiered box still keeps the markers accessible but encourages my children to keep them picked up rather than strewn all of the table. My kids absolutely adore them. I have found them to be able to stand up to the abuse of of young kids, and will certainly look to purchase further packs of these if required in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jon J.

customer_reviews.title: Great markers
customer_reviews.text: This set is amazing. I love that in includes some gel and some window markers as well. It does include some duplicates of certain colors, so you aren’t getting as many different colors as you think. For great quality, and the price, you can’t beat these.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and all in one box!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son and great deal!! My son loves to color and draw. He also needs these for his homework. Lots of colors to choose from and I didn’t need to buy a bunch of separate boxes from the store.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Nice selection of colors, even if there are duplicates
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old granddaughter was very happy with these. There are some duplicate colors, fortunately the light blue is one of them and the black which gets used a lot. And a couple dried out very quickly and some of the caps are super hard to snap back on. But overall a good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Emmie Kay

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly impressive! Favorite markers I've bought in awhile and they are super affordable!
customer_reviews.text: Love these markers. I have a bit of a marker/pen "collecting" problem. I have bought 100s of markers. Super expensive one to cheap ones and for just journaling/regular writing they are GREAT! Great vibrant colors. My friend does calligraphy and these are her favorite markers for general calligraphy due to the point and then ability to tilt it on its side for differing thicknesses.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Mangled box
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a replacement. I’m sure the markers will be great. It’s a gift, can’t have a smashed box. The box it was shipped in was totally fine... not sure how or why the marker box is ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Pina The Wonder Dog

customer_reviews.title: Mostly washable, great markers.
customer_reviews.text: Really good deal for 40 Markers. Having a toddler, I sometimes find open cap markers- RIP. So I bought a second box to keep as backup. The colors are very vibrant and they are mostly washable. I've got it washed off of t-shirts and wiped them off of floors and leather sofas with no problems. But on certain clothes I've had some trouble. I wouldn't take the "Washable" as granted so do prepare.
customer_reviews.author: SuziTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: CRAYOLA FOR THE WIN!!
customer_reviews.text: Always love crayons! This markets and their size are great for my 4yo, easy to hold, amazing color selection, and easy to store in a zip baggie.. a bit hard to put back on box but I wasn’t ever considering keeping the box.. love them
customer_reviews.author: CHANEL AGUILAR

customer_reviews.title: We didn't get all colors
customer_reviews.text: My children were disappointed. They were hoping to get 40 different colors as it states in the description and on the markers box, but we got 10 duplicates, and so are missing 10 colors - we got 40 markers but only 30 different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Y

customer_reviews.title: Your usual crayola excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the variety of colors in this pack. Just wish it included tan. I found the price to be well worth it at $15. My daughters are 2 and 4 so we go through a lot of markers. So being able to get one big set that lasts a while is great. Also being able to have multiple options for pink and purple really cuts back on bickering
customer_reviews.author: KRocque

customer_reviews.title: Color nicely and clean up easily
customer_reviews.text: I used the for a craft project with a group of toddlers at a 2nd birthday party. They voted nicely on the foam cutouts we were using and yet several parents actually commented on how easy it was to clean up the kids' hands afterward. I look forward to my daughter continuing to use these.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pettit

customer_reviews.title: Crayola makes the best markers ever for young children!
customer_reviews.text: You cant go wrong with Crayola, I received exactly what i would expect in the package, a great range of colors. There are 4 boxes of 10 inside. The price has gone up since I purchased them, but that price was great for the number of markers received.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Banks

customer_reviews.title: so many colors, compatible with Crayola light board
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for the Crayola light board, the original markers dried out and only has 6 colors. This one has so many colors and compatible with the board, easy to clean. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Great for a 5 year old
customer_reviews.text: My son loves drawing "mazes" and uses every color in the box. We ended up dumping these into a plastic bin because the box is aggravating to get markers in and out of for that age. Great size for little hands learning to grasp for writing
customer_reviews.author: Mish193

customer_reviews.title: Great if not broken. We
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves these fat crayons. They are easy for him to hold. Too bad they came with 1/2 tips broken off. Not sure what happened here. The bottom of the box was open and there were loose broken crayons in the amazon box. Booo!
customer_reviews.author: Tami M Walker

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The markers were dried out. After one coloring page the died.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Zindman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for little artists with big ideas
customer_reviews.text: Oh boy, can my 5yo tell one heck of a story! These markers allow her lots of colors to choose from for her illustrations. Purchased 2 months ago and still going strong with daily use.
customer_reviews.author: EmilyE

customer_reviews.title: Low quality markers
customer_reviews.text: These markers are very dull in color. They seem like they are drying out and we’ve barely used them. Also, they were not packed in a separate box, so they stuck the packing label right on the marker box. The box was so banged up when I got it that I had to find another container to store them in.
customer_reviews.author: C. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Happy Child
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them. But it does take a little bit of elbow grease to wash the colors off the skin. There was still faint coloring on her hands after washing.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wright

customer_reviews.title: A must for small kids
customer_reviews.text: If you have little kids, washable markers are a must. They end up drawing on everything. Some of the darker colors are harder to wash out. But for the most part, clean up is easy.
customer_reviews.author: S. Choy

customer_reviews.title: Great variety
customer_reviews.text: I love these markers! They wash well and offer a great variety. The caps are a little rough to get off for toddlers, but that isn't such a bad thing considering the items they like to color. Great deal for the number of markers.
customer_reviews.author: D. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: 2 boxes does not equal the 2 Crayola boxes of this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 2 pack version, and it came in the 128ct box that is for sale for only $17 here on Amazon. Super disappointed as I wanted 2 boxes, one for myself and one for my 5 yr old when she discovered my box so she could have her own and leave mine alone for my own coloring books. Beware of this.
customer_reviews.author: Deena

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: I love these and will continue to buy but I noticed some of them are moldy thats really gross and I dont know if they are safe to use so I threw them away
customer_reviews.author: Doot

customer_reviews.title: mahhhh
customer_reviews.text: dont buy these. the lids are impossible for a 4 year old to get off and back on. Within first use when you go to draw with some they almost seem to be running out of ink- the red drags kind of dry and a few of the other darker colors. They do wash off the skin easily but I don't want to have to manage the lid operation - off and on- the whole time my child uses these. Bad purchase.
customer_reviews.author: evan c.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I teach four year olds. The selection of colors can’t be beat. Some caps take super human strength to pop off for some reason and several colors went “dead” after one small coloring session. I expected more from crayola, but they’ll do for my small class.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Crow

customer_reviews.title: Variety of washable fun!
customer_reviews.text: My kids go crazy for these! Sooo many colors. Endless color options for the kids. Window markers, super washable markers, and gel markers in this pack. Such a great deal for the price! I highly recommend these for bored artsy toddlers and children.
customer_reviews.author: BREEBY

customer_reviews.title: Great product - SO many colors
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves having so many colors and price wise this set really can't be beat. Lots of great bright colors. Same good quality I've come to trust from crayola. Easy to wash off little hands, furniture and clothing. 5x the markers then you get in the classic 8 pack for way less than 5x the price - and you get so much more variety!
customer_reviews.author: pirateslovejazz

customer_reviews.title: Good for small painting.
customer_reviews.text: This is nice. However, they are too small. When my daughter needs to color a large painting, it takes too long. If you have the same goal, buy the thick tips.
customer_reviews.author: C. Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Great...but gel ones don’t work.
customer_reviews.text: Nice marker set. But the gel markers don’t work at all. Have to recycle them right out of the box. Reading reviews for them on the Crayola site, apparently that’s typical for those markers—they just don’t work. But the rest are great!
customer_reviews.author: Megan O.

customer_reviews.title: Crayola Are the Best!
customer_reviews.text: These markers are great! There are little cardboard sleeves to ensure the markers stand up straight and don't fall over horizontally into the box. You can't beat the price either bc these would retail easily closer to $20
customer_reviews.author: Poetniknowit

customer_reviews.title: Great markers but the box is useless as a storage ...
customer_reviews.text: Great markers but the box is useless as a storage container. The product is listed as "with a convenient flip top lid". That does not matter as there is no dividers in the box making it impossible to have 64 markers magically stand up on their own. Good markers just plan on a different storage container.
customer_reviews.author: Darren M. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t tried to clean off anything but a plastic table so gave it a 4. Lots of markers, good color. Get a roll of paper for ease and let your kids get creative.
customer_reviews.author: ECARMA

customer_reviews.title: Really small
customer_reviews.text: Homeschooling family--we just didn't care for these. They were a lot smaller than I was expecting. Will stick with the pipsqueaks.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Raineri

customer_reviews.title: So many beautiful colors!
customer_reviews.text: I was given a 10-pack of these washable markers and thought it was a gimmick, but I loved them so much I ordered this 40 pack. Perfect for homeschooling!
customer_reviews.author: Sus

customer_reviews.title: Hard to snap on covers
customer_reviews.text: Knocked one star off just bc it is SO hard to snap the cover on these markers! Which wasn’t ideal as these were a gift for my 3 year old. But they work well, clean up easily, & great for the price, so 🤷‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Nice little markers.
customer_reviews.text: These are nice little markers. I got them for adult coloring but don't do that much so they aren't much tested yet. I have used a couple for other purposes and find that they are okay, just that the colors seem so be darker than might be indicated on the caps so I just test them first on a piece of paper. I like the size and Crayola quality of these.
customer_reviews.author: Kharysma

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy on amazon markers did not work!!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money! Had to just throw them away has either they didn’t work due to being dried out, or hardly worked ( very light markings) super disappointed as we have never had an issue with crayons brand before.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Iverson

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.text: We used these markers for a birthday party activity. We colored t-shirts in pre-printed designs and then sent some of the markers home with the kids to recolor after washing. The market completely came out in the wash and didn't mess with the rest of the laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Angelita H.

customer_reviews.title: Many of the colors were dried out!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this marker set for my child who is recently very into coloring. We have purchased the 10 pack of ultra clean washable markers and were very happy with those but wanted more colors and markers. These are the perfect size for toddlers but I am so disappointed that so many of the colors didn't work at all - or were very faded almost dried out and quickly stopped working. I only purchased these a week or so ago so it has not been because of too much use.
customer_reviews.author: Ollie Smalls

product_meta.title: Crayola Ultra Clean Washable Broad Line Markers, 40 Classic Colors, Kids Indoor Activities At Home
product_meta.description: Color:Washable| Size:40 Ct| Design:Marker SetUpgrade your art or school supplies with a new Crayola Marker Set! These Ultra Clean Washable Markers come in 40 vibrant colors including Sea Foam Green, Tropical Violet, Coral Reef, and more! Artists of all ages will love the conical Broad Line Tips for drawing both thick and thin lines. Crayola Ultra Clean Markers wash easily from skin, most washable clothing, and painted walls. They’re the perfect art tool for classroom activities, arts and crafts projects, coloring books and more. Pair with Crayola Construction Paper (sold separately) for the perfect bundled gift for kids! Safe and nontoxic, ideal for kids ages 3 and up.
feature_bullets: CRAYOLA BROAD LINE MARKERS: Features 40 Crayola Ultra Clean Washable Markers in assorted colors.
ULTRA CLEAN WASHABLE MARKERS: Wash from skin, most washable clothing, and most painted walls.
AT HOME CRAFTS & INDOOR ACTIVITIES: Keep spirits high with creative art supplies! Simple and fun crafts for kids are a great way to stay thoughtfully engaged and entertained.
ART & SCHOOL SUPPLIES: Perfect for art projects, classroom activities, and more activities with fine details!
SAFE & NONTOXIC: Ideal for kids ages 3 & up.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars5,475 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
